abstract: Countrywide Financial, the subprime lending specialist that Bank of America bought in 2008, continues to drain the bank’s resources. With federal prosecutors seeking to collect more than $1 billion in penalties over a Countrywide lending program, DealBook takes stock of all the red ink.
